name: Mini Golf Center: free stickman golf
name_original: Mini Golf Center: free stickman golf
description:
Mini Golf Center is a golf simulation game, the best mobile golf game.
Wanna take a shot in golf center? Try this best golf game, enjoy greatest golfing experience. Either a pro or new to golf, you will both find tons of fun in this golf game!

How to play Mini Golf Center:
Pan around, zoom in and out to locate the golf hole, adjust stroke angle, control your strength! Practice you golf skill! Become the best golfer!

Features
- 72+ unique golf challenges
- Stunning graphics and fantastic sound
- Collect stars to unlock new golf courses
- Over 24 scenes play sport in unlimited places: suburb, power station, outer space, etc.

Play Mini Golf Center anywhere, anytime. You are the next golf star!
